sources.name: Fish and seafood consumption per capita- FAOstat
sources.description:
Data published by Food and Agricultural Organization of the United Nations (FAO)
Data publisher's source FAO aggregates data from national country statistics, census data and household surveys
Link http://www.fao.org/faostat/en/#data/FBS
Retrieved 2017-05-09

Data is inclusive of all fish species and major seafood commodities, including crustaceans, cephalopods and other mollusc species.

variables.name: Fish and seafood consumption per capita- FAOstat
variables.description: Fish and seafood consumption per capita 1961-2013- FAOstat
